otherNames: 混沌天帝夫, Chaotic Heavenly Emperor Husband, Husband of the Chaotic Heavenly Emperor, Emperor Husband of Chaos
synopsis: Chu Jianqiu is the young master of the Chu family, one of the four major families in Tianshui County. At the age of four, he started cultivating his body, and at fourteen, he awakened the rare Nine Yang bloodline of the Earth-grade top quality. Despite being naturally gifted, his cultivation declined over three years while he was helping Miss Liu Tianyao of the Liu family recover from a severe illness. To make matters worse, after Chu Jianqiu healed, Liu Tianyao betrayed him with Ouyang Yuan, even attempting to take his life. Severely injured, Chu Jianqiu was thrown into a ravine but unexpectedly awakened the supreme chaotic bloodline!
